sect1.title: AAAA configuration
sect1.para: The aspects of authentication,authorization,auditing and accounting are defined in different sections of the configuration. Connection based authorization for example that defines from where we can connect is configured as part of the listener configurations as IP restrictions (see chapter 'Server configuration'). An other example are authorization functions that a called in the processing engine to determine wheter a user is allowed to execute a function, to access a resource, etc. These functions are defined in programs configured in the Processing section.

For defining the units and resources involved in AAAA, we define the section AAAA of the server configuration. The following example shows an empty AAAA configuration section:
AAAA { ;... configuration for ; authentication,authorization,auditing and accounting }
